name: Blast (itch) (PixelPhobicGames)
description:
Blast is my entree for The 2021 March 4th - March 12th Retro Game Jam. This is also the first Game Jam I've ever done

Warning: Do not remove the Assets folder and Make sure You have some sort of audio device plugged in... The Game Won't turn on if not.

We were supposed to limit our self's to a specific console. I didn't really do this because I couldn't find a 2D old console that supported 480p or the specific color pallet I wanted to use. So I Remade Atari Space Invaders in the "Style" of A Snes / NES / Genesis Game. I did cheat a little by adding HD music instead of chip-tune this is my bad. I didn't allocate time very properly so I just threw together some music in Garage Band and called it a day. I used Raylib 3.5 and C to make this game.

I hope you enjoy The Game ! - Liquid

Controls:

XBOX Controller - Right Trigger "Shoot", DPAD "Movement"

Keyboard - Arrow Keys "Movement", Left Click or Space "Shoot"
